text: nampikkai koṇṭavarkaḷilum palar, (pōraip paṟṟi) oru (taṉi) attiyāyam iṟakkappaṭa vēṇṭāmā? Eṉṟu kūṟukiṉṟaṉar. Avvāṟē (teḷivāṉa) oru tiṭṭamāṉa attiyāyam iṟakkappaṭṭu pōr ceyyumāṟu atil kūṟappaṭṭiruntāl, evarkaḷuṭaiya uḷḷaṅkaḷil nōy irukkiṟatō avarkaḷ, maraṇa avastaiyil cikki mayaṅkik kiṭappavar pārppataip pōl (napiyē!)
